features: 【Ultimate Comfort】- The ergonomic office chair features a double-layer thickened seat cushion and double-wing wrapped padding on the sides,allowing the body to sink into cloud-like comfort,with a padded headrest and padded arms providing extra support.Relieve stress from sitting for long periods of time

【Quality Leather Chair】-Made of soft matte high quality PU leather,super skin-friendly and easy to clean,wide seat with unique side padding and back zip design,and can be used for storage of small parts,convenient and comfortable;load capacity of 300 lbs,suitable for home,office,meeting room,reception room and other occasions

【Adjustable Office Chairs】-This executive office chair features multiple adjustments,including 90°flip-up armrests,you can lift it up for more space freedom;The height of the chair can be adjusted from 34.2"-38.2"via the handle,making it a perfect fit for different heights;Seat bottom tilt adjuster adjusts backrest angle from 90°-115°,and can enter the swing lock mode through the handle,adapting to various sitting postures

【Sturdy And Durable】-With a sturdy base and smooth,silent rolling casters,our swivel task chair rotates 360°to give you smooth rolling on different materials.The desk chair can bear a weight of 300 pounds,has SGS certification mark,safe and durable,and can be used as a student study chair,computer chair,ergonomic chair,work chair,task chair, etc.

【Satisfactory After-sales Service】-1 year warranty,the package contains all parts and instructions or through the installation video,you can assemble this small chair easily and quickly;if you have any other questions about this office desk chair,please feel free to contact us,we will be happy to assemble it within 24 reply to your email within hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Guessky Executive Office Chair—Comfortable For Long Periods Of Sitting Guessky small office chair is comfortable and elegant in appearance,It is made of faux leather and has a double-wing padded design.It eliminates back pain and discomfort caused by working overtime or playing games.You can do what you want while sitting in our executive chairs.
Adjustable office chairs armrests can be flipped up,easy pushed under the desk,placed in a relatively narrow within an area of 1㎡,maximize the realization of space freedom.

MORE DETAILS THAT YOU DO WANT TO MISS Padded Soft Armrests Soft faux-leather padded armrests for improved forearm comfort and effective support SGS Certifief Air Rod Safe and trust worthy smooth height adjustment Smooth Rolling Casters 360-degree swivel casters, flexible and smooth movement, will not hurt the floor High Quality Tilt Knob Rotate the tilt tension knob to control the tension of the backrest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice oversized chair
reviews.reviewText: I purchase the same model for my office at work. Big supportive and comfortable. Reclines nicely and supports my weight I am six feet tall and my head rests comfortably on the headrest part. Sturdy bottom and my massage pad fit nice in the chair as well. Arm rests are comfortable too. Wide sitting area and wide back. The price is reasonable and worth it. Very good, very comfortable chair to sit in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elegant Office Chair. Height Slightly Lower Than Most.
reviews.reviewText: High quality office chair. Thick cushions make it extremely comfortable. Made from a nice quality PU leather material. Closely resembles genuine leather & doesn’t feel cheap. Has all the adjustable functions you’d expect from a good office chair. Gas lift, height adjusting lever & tilt knob for smooth rocking motion with a deep lean. Tilt can be locked/unlocked with lever by pushing it in/out. What makes this chair stand out is that the armrests can be lifted completely up & out of the way. This is great for someone who frequently gets in/out of their chair, but also allows me to push the chair completely underneath my desk. Saving valuable space in my small home office. It does sit about 2” shorter than all my other office chairs. At the tallest height, it’s about 19” from floor to seat. I’ve found most standard office chairs are 21”. Even though it’s only 2”, it is a noticeable difference that I’m sitting in a lower position at my desk. I guess this would be great if you have a small desk or for someone shorter than 5’5” or maybe a child. At its lowest point, it’s just shy of 16” floor to seat. I’m still in a comfortable position for work. It just feels odd to have my hands rest slightly raised above my elbows when at my keyboard. It was mostly easy to assemble. The instructions were easy to follow & the parts clearly labeled. All the parts were stored in a zippered compartment on the backrest before assembly. The only problem I ran into was attaching the armrests. You will need 2 people at this step. I had to hold the armrest in place while my husband put in the screws because it was impossible to do it alone. Even then, the screws were difficult to put in with the included Allen wrench. We had to use one from our toolbox because the included wrench kept slipping & almost stripped out the head on the screws. The metal base is sturdy. Wheels roll smoothly across my hardwood floors & carpet desk mat. I love the cross pattern stitchwork. This gives the chair a very elegant & classy look. Overall, it’s a great office chair. Do wish it were a few inches taller & would recommend making some modifications to the steps for attaching the armrests. I recommend attaching them prior to installing the base mount, so you can hold the backrest & seat together upright. This makes it a lot easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Chair is comfortable and the color is beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Un Boxing and Assembly
reviews.reviewText: The Office Chair arrived in one fairly small box. Pictured above is the Contance of that box. There are no legs, base or arm rests. After going through the instructions (only 2 pages with pictures) three times and then my wife also reading them, we both agreed there must be a second box? It was only after going online and asking for the missing parts and ultimately having another chair sent out, did we find a zipper on the chair back and inside the hollow chair back was all the missing parts.Upon re-reading the instructions a fifth time, we found a very small (fine print, everything else is in BOLD print), photo of a blank rectangle with a flap folded back and a small print "please open the zipper."We have only used the chair a few hours, but it seems well made and is comfortable.It takes 2 people to assemble the arms to the seat & back and then takes a lot of twisting, grunting and grumbling to get it together. The alignment is difficult. I will update my review after we've used the chair a few weeks and I have taken a heart pill or Scotch to calm down. I think we are going to like this chair it's just the instructions could be more forthcoming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This chair has the large space.You could follow the instructions to set it up.The only thing is that the back of the chair is little shorter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars So close, and yet so far.
reviews.reviewText: Please note I am quite a big fellow at 6'4" 240 Lbs, and as such I shopped around for a chair specced to my size, 300 pound weight limit (60 pounds under rated load), 138$ before tax, seems like the seat will be roughly the size i need. check, check, check! I'll try anything once, and Amazon's return policy is excellent. However, It is probable that i was sent a defective unit. Stranger things happen all the time. But, based on the directions and the cracking of the base plate to test if it leaned back... I think there is no QC, and this is just the product. I'll quote the directions in step 4 (see attached picture) verbatim, "Caution: When you connect the armrest with the cushion, if the hole position of the armrest is not aligned with the hole position of the cushion, please force the armrest to align with the hole position of the cushion and install the screw". This is a normal step when putting together a chair, usually the holes will be off maybe a millimeter or two max. The armrest was 2 inches away from the backrest before "forcing" them into position. That is enough slop in manufacturing to feed a whole hog farm. I did not own the chair long enough, about 30 minutes to put it together then take it back apart after a very short test, to test the longevity of the hydraulics. The base of the unit, hydraulic bottle, wheels, supports, and plate seemed like they were of decent quality to good. The chair portion was abysmal. Buyer Beware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and high quality, perfect gift for my at school daughter..

The chair looks prety and exactly same as displayed. Package are very neat and all those parts are put in the rear opening of the chair's backrest, really a wonderful idea. The installation video are very clear and helpful.Chair is very comfortable to sit on. Arm rests are comfortable too. Can easily adjust the sitting positions for enhanced comfort . The wheels are quite smooth.I am very satisfied. The price is reasonable and worth it.

reviews.reviewerName: These chairs  are very comfortable, but it doesn’t have white colour any  more, I hope they have so I need 3 of them more
reviews.reviewText: Use for the salon, clients love them
This chair is awesome for the price! Highly recommend and was easy to assemble.
Very comfortable, the wheels are quite smooth, there are no problems so far, very satisfied.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not a bad chair, but the back seems oddly short
reviews.reviewText: I work from home 60% of the time now, so I thought it was time to upgrade from my kitchen chair.When we opened the box, at first we thought we were missing some pieces. Upon further investigation, the back of the chair unzips and there's a space there where some of the parts were packed.We aren't the handiest people in the world and weren't trying to rush, it took about a half hour for one person to put this chair together.I'm 5'11 and I was pleasantly surprised to find the chair is tall enough for me to sit in comfortably with my feet flat on the floor and legs are supported. The seat is also quite wide; I am plus sized, and there's more than enough space for me to sit.On the negative side, the back seems kind of short, it barely reaches armpit level. The arms, while they do flip up out of the way when you don't need them, you cannot adjust the height. When I'm sitting up straight with my arms bent 90 degrees, my arms don't touch the armrests. While I'm tall for a woman, many men are taller and this wouldn't be comfortable for people much taller than me.In my office location I may sit for hours without getting up, and I would probably not find this chair suitable. But since it's in my home office, I am more frequently getting up and moving around so its support/padding isn't really a huge issue.Overall, not a bad chair for the price ($199 at the time I ordered) but not one I would sit in for hours on end.
